The endpoint url can change but is provided in the Get Stellar toml endpoint response under the `WEB_AUTH_ENDPOINT` variable."

import { SepBadge } from "@site/src/components/SepBadge";

<SepBadge tags={''} />

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Request Challenge Transaction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/WEB_AUTH_ENDPOINT"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Allows the wallet to get the SEP-10 challenge transaction to be signed. More information [here](https://github.com/stellar/stellar-protocol/blob/master/ecosystem/sep-0010.md#challenge). The endpoint url can change but is provided in the Get Stellar toml endpoint response under the `WEB_AUTH_ENDPOINT` variable.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Query Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"account","in":"query","description":"The Client Account, which can be a stellar account (G...) or muxed account (M...) that the Client wishes to authenticate with the Server..","required":true,"style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"memo","in":"query","description":"The memo to attach to the challenge transaction. Only permitted if a Stellar account (G...) is used. The memo must be of type id. Other memo types are not supported.","required":false,"style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"client_domain","in":"query","description":"a Client Domain. Need to be supplied by all Clients/Wallets.","required":true,"style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>
